heroDescription: FarmLink is the all-in-one platform empowering farmers, retailers, and local markets with AI-driven insights for a more efficient and fair agricultural ecosystem.
featuresDescription: Our powerful AI tools and transparent marketplace provide everything you need to thrive.
featurePriceAdvisorDesc: Leverage AI to get fair price recommendations for your produce based on quality and real-time market data.
featureMarketDataDesc: Access up-to-the-minute market prices and trends to make informed selling and purchasing decisions.
featureSupplyChainDesc: Our AI analyzes supply and demand to recommend the most efficient distribution strategies to minimize waste.
featurePersonalizedDealsDesc: Retailers receive AI-powered recommendations for the best deals based on their purchasing history.
featureDirectConnectionsDesc: A transparent marketplace that directly connects farmers with retailers and local markets, fostering community.
featureAIAssistantsDesc: Get instant answers to your questions with our platform-wide FAQ bot and specialized Agri-Assistant for farmers.
aiShowcaseDesc: FarmLink integrates cutting-edge AI to provide instant support and expert advice. Whether you're a farmer needing crop advice or a new user exploring the platform, our AI assistants are here to help.
agriAssistantDesc: Get expert answers to your farming questions, from pest control to market trends.
platformFaqBotDesc: Have a question about a feature? Our FAQ bot provides instant answers.
askAboutCrops: Ask a question about your crops...
agriAssistantInitialMessage: Hello! Your Agricultural Expert is Here, 24/7. Ask me about your crops.
howItWorksDesc: Joining our network is simple and quick.
howItWorksStep1Desc: Choose your portal and register as a Farmer, Retailer, or Market Manager.
howItWorksStep2Desc: Access powerful tools tailored to your role, from listing produce to analyzing data.
howItWorksStep3Desc: Connect with partners, make sales, place orders, and grow your business.
testimonial1Quote: FarmLink has revolutionized how I sell my produce. The AI price advisor helps me get the best price every time.
testimonial2Quote: Finding high-quality, local produce has never been easier. The recommended deals save me time and money.
testimonial3Quote: The Agri-Assistant chatbot is incredible. It's like having a farming expert in my pocket 24/7. I get instant advice on everything.
getInTouchDesc: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.
contactFormDesc: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
name: Name
messageSentDesc: Thank you for your feedback. We'll get back to you soon.
chooseYourPortalDesc: Select the portal that matches your role to log in or create an account.
farmerPortalDesc: Manage your produce, track earnings, and connect with markets.
retailerPortalDesc: Browse produce, place orders, and discover new local suppliers.
marketPortalDesc: Oversee market operations, participation, and logistics.
adminPortalDesc: System administration, user management, and analytics.
faqBotInitialMessage: Hello! How can I help you learn about FarmLink today?
adminRegisterDesc: Create an account to manage the FarmLink platform.
farmerLoginDesc: Access your dashboard to manage your produce and earnings.
farmerRegisterDesc: Create an account to manage your produce and earnings.
marketLoginDesc: Access your dashboard to oversee market operations.
marketRegisterDesc: Create an account to oversee market operations and logistics.
retailerLoginDesc: Access your dashboard to browse produce and place orders.
retailerRegisterDesc: Create an account to browse produce and place orders.
farmerDashboardDesc: Welcome back! Here's an overview of your farming activities.
errorMustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view your listings.
errorFailedToFetchListings: Failed to fetch listings from the database.
noProduceListed: You haven't listed any produce yet.
